title: Brother Sun, Sister Moon: Saint Francis of Assisi's Canticle of the Creatures
description: In Brother Sun, Sister Moon, award-winning author Katherine Paterson reimagines a hymn of praise originally written by Saint Francis of Assisi in 1224. Illuminated with the exquisite illustrations of cut-paper artist Pamela Dalton, this picture book offers a stunningly beautiful tribute to nature.
author: Katherine Paterson
